content.introduction: I have carefully selected modern, robust technologies to ensure your website is fast, secure, and maintainable. The proposed tech stack provides the perfect foundation for a professional corporate website.

items.name: Frontend
technologies: Next.js (App Router) - React framework for production
Tailwind CSS + Shadcn UI - Utility-first CSS and accessible components
React Query - Data fetching and state management

items.name: Backend
technologies: NestJS (TypeScript, modular API design) - Enterprise-grade Node.js framework
Supabase (Postgres, Auth, Storage) - Open-source Firebase alternative

items.name: Deployment
technologies: Traefik (reverse proxy, SSL, auto-renew) - Modern edge router
Custom self-managed Linux VPS (firewall, CI/CD, SSH hardening) - Complete control over infrastructure
CI/CD pipeline - Automated testing and deployment

content.note: All technologies used are open-source and industry-standard, ensuring long-term maintainability and avoiding vendor lock-in.
